Subject: The Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko:



Koga Shuko was the last one to get out of a CR chamber.  Heading to the 
bridge, he got to the main computer console.  Pressing a few buttons, he 
activated the long range transmission satellite dish, which raised 8 feet 
into the air.

~Lord Hell Beast, this, is Koga Shuko.  I have a business proposition for 
you.  We are both Predacons.  With the same goals.  The same ideas.  We want 
the Maximals and their Autobot ancestors DEAD!  We want to mine this pitiful 
rock for all its worth.  And we don't want interference with our plans.  I 
propose a peace treaty between our two factions.  Together, no one on the 
planet can stop us!  Not even the Alliance joined with the Maximals and every 
neutral being on this planet!  We would be unstoppable!  I, with my forces 
and my wealth, you with your mass forces.  We could mine the planet 3 times 
as quick.  Fifty, fifty as it were.  Reply with your thoughts.  If you agree, 
then we will discuss mobilization for the destruction of the Ark!~

His transmission launched in a tight laser message, heading for Hell Beast's 
ships.  Koga Shuko took a seat, waiting.
